title: Immunity debugger anti anti debug
content: I using Windows, and I was wondering what is the best anti anti debug plugin that exist, I tried to use hidedebug by Bob -> Team PEiD, but unfortunately it catch only the regular ways, I know that some of you will send me to the documents of all functions, but I'm looking for something that will make my life easier. P.S: I'm trying to debug just for fun and not for work :) Thanks ahead.

comments.text: precisely because of the fun you should not look for easy way, because you will miss all the fun in that way.

answers_data.content: You can try ScyllaHide. There is no plugin for Immunity Debugger, but there is one for OllyDbg and that should make it trivial to port. Alternatively you can see this answer on how to hide any process with ScyllaHide regardless of the debugger you're using.

have you tried patch_antidebug.py ?

https://github.com/theevilbit/immunity_scripts/archive/b0876ee751a00d0f0840be5a728de6b71ee50982/theevilbit_immunity_scripts-b0876ee7.tar.gz
